techmeme.title: HP CEO Enrique Lores says the company will have shifted 90% of its production for North America outside of China by the end of October 2025 (O'Ryan Johnson/CRN)
Microsoft releases Copilot for Mac, including a shortcut command to open the app, in the US, UK, and Canada, and adds a split screen mode to the iPad version (Tom Warren/The Verge)
MetaMask Head of Security Taylor Monahan says the Bybit hackers have moved at least 209,384 ETH, of ~400,000 stolen, onto Bitcoin, largely using THORChain swaps (Daniel Kuhn/The Block)
Documents: Tesla applied late last year for a transportation permit in California that suggests it's working to launch a ride-hailing business in the near term (Dana Hull/Bloomberg)
IBM says it has completed its $6.4B HashiCorp acquisition, confirming that the US FTC quietly cleared the deal just before the UK CMA's approval on February 25 (Paul Sawers/TechCrunch)
